title: My phone keeps making the notification sounds but no notification.
content:
There is no need notification and my phone keeps making the sound.
I have done the following and nothing has worked.
Reset all app settings
Turn off wireless alerts
Turn off wifi alerts
Turn off NFC
View notification log in the widgets after sound and no new notification
Turn off bluetooth completely
I have also cha fed my notification sound three time to make sure it is in fact the notification sound. 
Please let me know the fix. I'm so tired of this I need my notification sounds on for work. This is my first experience with the pixel and so far I am not happy at all.
